testcase.name: sitterGetTest

error.message:
An exception occurred when decoding using the AutomaticPojoCodec. Decoding into a 'SitterMgd' failed with the following exception:
Could not construct new instance of: SitterMgd. Missing the following properties: [sitter_type, base_price, last_name, min_age, first_name, is_available]
A custom Codec or PojoCodec may need to be explicitly configured and registered to handle this type.

testcase.name: sitterUpdateTest

error.message:
An exception occurred when decoding using the AutomaticPojoCodec. Decoding into a 'SitterMgd' failed with the following exception:
Could not construct new instance of: SitterMgd. Missing the following properties: [sitter_type, base_price, last_name, min_age, first_name, is_available]
A custom Codec or PojoCodec may need to be explicitly configured and registered to handle this type.
